item.title: British Honoraries from Nepal
item.description: Source:- https://military.wikia.org/wiki/List_of_honorary_British_knights_and_dames Period:- 1858 - 1986 Grades of the Royal Victorian Order Grade Knight/Dame Grand Cross Knight/Dame Commander Commander Lieutenant Member Medal(associated) Prefix Sir/Dame Sir/Dame Post-nominal letters GCVO KCVO/DCVO CVO LVO MVO RVM List of Recipients Name Nationality Honour Year Category Notes Jang Bahadur Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCB 1858 Royalty Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCB 1905 Royalty Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCVO 1911 Royalty Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCMG 1911 Royalty Bhim Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KCVO 1917 Royalty Bhim Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCMG 1917 Royalty Sher Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1919 Royalty Baber Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1919 Royalty Baber Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCVO 1919 Royalty Padma Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1920 Royalty Tej Shamsher Jang Bahdur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1924 Royalty Kaiser Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1924 Royalty Kaiser Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1931 Royalty Bahadur Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1931 Royalty Bahadur Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KCB 1934 Royalty Krishna Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1935 Royalty Juddha Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCB 1937 Royalty Singha Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1937 Royalty Nir Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1939 Royalty Nir Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCVO 1942 Royalty Kiran Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1945 Royalty Kiran Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KCVO 1945 Royalty Mohan Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1945 Royalty Mohan Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCB 1945 Royalty Shankar Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KBE 1946 Royalty Shankar Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1946 Royalty Subarna Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCVO 1949 Royalty Arjun Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KCVO 1950 Royalty Samrajya Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KCVO 1953 Royalty Nara Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty KCVO 1960 Royalty Jagdish Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana Nepal – Rana Dynasty GBE 1961 Royalty Preksha Rajya Lakshmi Devi Nepal – Rana Dynasty GCVO 1961 Royalty Prince Himalaya Pratap Bir Bikram Shah Nepal – Shah Dynasty GBE 1961 Royalty Prince Himalaya Pratap Bir Bikram Shah Nepal – Shah Dynasty GCMG 1961 Royalty Prince Basundhara Bir Bikram Shah Nepal – Shah Dynasty GCMG 1961 Royalty King Mahendra Nepal – Shah Dynasty RVC 1961 Royalty King Birendra Nepal – Shah Dynasty RVC 1961 Royalty King Gyanendra Nepal – Shah Dynasty GCMG 1961 Royalty Prince Dhirendra Bir Bikram Shah Deva Nepal – Shah Dynasty GCMG 1975 Royalty Bhim Shumshere Jung Nepal KCVO 1980 Politics/Government Bhim Shumshere Jung Nepal KCSI 1986 Politics/Government Subsequently promoted GCSI in 1931.
